title: Sacrifice Doll
description: Summon a LvL2 from your deck, equip it. Equip: Can't attack/block.

title: Shadow Witch
description: On Play: Summon a LvL2 minion from your GY.

title: Undead Crone
description: On Play: Add a spell from your deck to your hand.

title: Vexis, the Exiled
description: On Play: Opponent discards all cards from their hand.

title: Witch Ascend
description: When you sacrifice one or more minions to cast a spell, tap this: Draw a card.

title: Witch Ritual
description: Summon Vexis, the Exiled from your hand/deck/GY for free.

title: Witch Wrath
description: When your minion dies, repeat twice: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion.

title: Xarion the Undying
description: Death: Put 5 spells from your GY to the bottom of your deck in any order to resummon this.

title: Mystic Chamber
description: When you cast a spell that sacrifices a LvL2, you can tap this, discard a card: Resummon it.

title: Ritual Field
description: When you sacrifice your 3rd minion this turn, tap this: Opponent sacrifices a minion.

title: Bound Servant
description: Death: If died by a spell, resummon this.

title: Dark Calling
description: Summon a minion from your hand for free. Give it +1/+1 this turn for each minion sacrificed.

title: Dark Grimoire
description: Draw 4 cards.

title: Ethereal Citadel
description: LvL4 or lower minions have -2 Attack.

title: Fireborn Familiar
description: Death: If died by a spell, destroy an enemy minion.

title: Moonlight Lady
description: When you sacrifice another minion to cast a spell, draw a card for each.

title: Annihilation
description: For each minion sacrificed, destroy an enemy minion.

title: Arcane Familiar
description: Death: If you cast a spell this turn, draw 2 cards.

title: Azgul, the Oblivion
description: On Play: Opponent sacrifices 4 minions. For each they can't, draw a card.

title: Baby Beholder
description: When sacrificing this, treat it as two LvL2 minions.

title: Zhar'kul, Death Lord
description: Double Strike. Has +2/+2 for each minion that died this turn. On Play: Gain 2 Shields.

title: Necrocircle
description: Summon a LvL9 or lower minion from your GY for free.
